verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֗ית <S%H7225><s%> In the beginning מַמְלְכ֛וּת <S%H4468><s%> of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> came this word הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֲמֹד֮ <S%H5975><s%> Stand בַּחֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S וְדִבַּרְתָּ֞ <S%H1696><s%> and speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> unto all the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַבָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> which come לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <S%H7812><s%> to worship בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD'S אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> all the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּיתִ֖יךָ <S%H6680><s%> that I command לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> thee to speak אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּגְרַ֖ע <S%H1639><s%> unto them diminish דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> not a word

אוּלַ֣י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> If so be they will hearken וְיָשֻׁ֕בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and turn אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> from his evil וְנִחַמְתִּ֣י <S%H5162><s%> that I may repent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> from הָרָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> me of the evil אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I חֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H2803><s%> which I purpose לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לָהֶ֔ם מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> unto them because רֹ֥עַ <S%H7455><s%> of the evil מַעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> of their doings

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> If ye will not hearken אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> walk בְּת֣וֹרָתִ֔י <S%H8451><s%> in my law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have set לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

לִשְׁמֹ֗עַ <S%H8085><s%> To hearken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto דִּבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> to the words עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> of my servants הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> whom I sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to you וְהַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> unto you both rising up early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> and sending וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H8085><s%> [them] but ye have not hearkened

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <S%H5414><s%> Then will I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> this house הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this כְּשִׁלֹ֑ה <S%H7887><s%> like Shiloh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> this city [הַזֹּאתָה כ] (הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise ק) אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and will make לִקְלָלָ֔ה <S%H7045><s%> a curse לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> to all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth ס

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֛וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard הַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <S%H3548><s%> So the priests וְהַנְּבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah מְדַבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> speaking אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had made an end יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Now it came to pass when Jeremiah לְדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> of speaking אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> all that the LORD לְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> [him] to speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people וַיִּתְפְּשׂ֨וּ <S%H8610><s%> took אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <S%H3548><s%> that the priests וְהַנְּבִאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> him saying מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Thou shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> die

מַדּוּעַ֩ <S%H4069><s%> Why נִבֵּ֨יתָ <S%H5012><s%> Why hast thou prophesied בְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כְּשִׁלוֹ֙ <S%H7887><s%> shall be like Shiloh יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> This house הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> This וְהָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> and this city הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תֶּחֱרַ֖ב <S%H2717><s%> shall be desolate מֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> without an inhabitant וַיִּקָּהֵ֧ל <S%H6950><s%> were gathered כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ? And all the people אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> about יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> against Jeremiah בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ ׀ <S%H8085><s%> heard שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> When the princes יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> then they came up מִבֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> from the king's בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <S%H3427><s%> and sat down בְּפֶ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> in the entry שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> gate יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S הֶחָדָֽשׁ׃ <S%H2319><s%> of the new ס

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> Then spake הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְהַנְּבִאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> unto the princes וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and to all the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> [is] worthy מָ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> to die לָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> This man הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִבָּא֙ <S%H5012><s%> for he hath prophesied אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> against this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> as ye have heard בְּאָזְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H241><s%> with your ears

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then spake יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> unto all the princes וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and to all the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD שְׁלָחַ֗נִי <S%H7971><s%> sent לְהִנָּבֵ֞א <S%H5012><s%> me to prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> against this house הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> and against this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H8085><s%> that ye have heard

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הֵיטִ֤יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> Therefore now amend דַרְכֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1870><s%> your ways וּמַ֣עַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4611><s%> and your doings וְשִׁמְע֕וּ <S%H8085><s%> and obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְיִנָּחֵ֣ם <S%H5162><s%> will repent יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> him of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> that he hath pronounced עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> I am in בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> As for me behold I [am] in your hand עֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> do לִ֛י כַּטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וְכַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> and meet בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> with me as seemeth

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> Only יָדֹ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> But know תֵּדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> ye for certain כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מְמִתִ֣ים <S%H4191><s%> that if ye put me to death אַתֶּם֮ <S%H859><s%> you אֹתִי֒ <S%H853><s%> כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for דָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֗י <S%H5355><s%> innocent אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you נֹתְנִ֣ים <S%H5414><s%> ye shall surely bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> upon yourselves and upon this city הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and on יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <S%H3427><s%> and upon the inhabitants כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בֶאֱמֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> thereof for of a truth שְׁלָחַ֤נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> to you לְדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> me unto you to speak בְּאָזְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H241><s%> in your ears אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these ס

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said הַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> the princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <S%H5030><s%> and to the prophets אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> No לָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> This man הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> [is] not worthy מָ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> to die כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> in בְּשֵׁ֛ם <S%H8034><s%> to us in the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> for he hath spoken אֵלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיָּקֻ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> Then rose up אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> certain מִזִּקְנֵ֖י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> to all the assembly הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

[מִיכָיָהּ כ] (מִיכָה֙ <S%H4320><s%> Micah ק) הַמּ֣וֹרַשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H4183><s%> the Morasthite הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become נִבָּ֔א <S%H5012><s%> prophesied בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> in the days חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַם֩ <S%H5971><s%> to all the people יְהוּדָ֨ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֵאמֹ֜ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts צִיּ֞וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion שָׂדֶ֤ה <S%H7704><s%> [like] a field תֵֽחָרֵשׁ֙ <S%H2790><s%> shall be plowed וִירוּשָׁלַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem עִיִּ֣ים <S%H5856><s%> shall become heaps תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will become וְהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house לְבָמ֥וֹת <S%H1116><s%> as the high places יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> of a forest

הֶהָמֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> put him at all הֱ֠מִתֻהוּ <S%H4191><s%> to death חִזְקִיָּ֨הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Did Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> and all Judah הֲלֹא֮ <S%H3808><s%> not יָרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> ? did he not fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיְחַל֙ <S%H2470><s%> and besought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the favor יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <S%H5162><s%> repented יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> him of the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which he had pronounced עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> against וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> against them? Thus עֹשִׂ֛ים <S%H6213><s%> might we procure רָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> evil גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against נַפְשׁוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5315><s%> against our souls

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> Indeed אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And there was also a man הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִתְנַבֵּא֙ <S%H5012><s%> that prophesied בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֽוּרִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H223><s%> Urijah בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁמַעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah מִקִּרְיַ֖ת הַיְּעָרִ֑ים <S%H7157><s%> of Kirjathjearim וַיִּנָּבֵ֞א <S%H5012><s%> who prophesied עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> against this city הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and against this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> similar כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> according to all the words יִרְמְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְ֠הוֹיָקִים <S%H3079><s%> And when Jehoiakim וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all גִּבּוֹרָ֤יו <S%H1368><s%> with all his mighty men וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> and all the princes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָ֔יו <S%H1697><s%> his words וַיְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> sought הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הֲמִית֑וֹ <S%H4191><s%> to put him to death וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard אוּרִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H223><s%> but when Urijah וַיִּרָ֔א <S%H3372><s%> it he was afraid וַיִּבְרַ֖ח <S%H1272><s%> and fled וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> and went מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוֹיָקִ֛ים <S%H3079><s%> And Jehoiakim אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> men מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֶלְנָתָ֧ן <S%H494><s%> [namely] Elnathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַכְבּ֛וֹר <S%H5907><s%> of Achbor וַאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> and men אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> with אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> him מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> with him into Egypt

וַיּוֹצִ֨יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> And they fetched forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוּרִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H223><s%> Urijah מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַיְבִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוֹיָקִ֔ים <S%H3079><s%> him unto Jehoiakim וַיַּכֵּ֖הוּ <S%H5221><s%> who slew בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> him with the sword וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֙ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלָת֔וֹ <S%H5038><s%> his dead body אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into קִבְרֵ֖י <S%H6913><s%> into the graves בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the common הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> people

אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> but יַ֚ד <S%H3027><s%> Nevertheless the hand אֲחִיקָ֣ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֔ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֶֽת־ <S%H854><s%> was with יִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <S%H3414><s%> was with Jeremiah לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> was not תֵּת־ <S%H5414><s%> that they should not give אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> him into the hand הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> to put him to death פ
